findings.title:
Credential in plaintext?

Rule: Env Var
Line: curl -v -u 'example@example.com:password' --header 'If-Modified-Since:Sat, 02 Feb 2013 15:20:46 GMT' --header 'If-None-Match:"c7d001e87bda1f0d3745b6bd2811b055"' https://api.feedbin.com/v2/subscriptions/3.json

Commit: .
findings.description:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

## Additional information

**[Env Var](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html)**
